document_data.name: Orgelna Highshield
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Orgelna Highshield''' was a famed artist of [[Selgaunt]], considered to be the most prestigious sculptor of [[Sembia]] by some in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Orgelna was a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] woman with a lush beard and surly demeanor. She wore cartoonishly thick [[spectacles]].
document_data.History: Orgelna Highshield's work was an impressive sight: a bushy-bearded dwarvish woman scampering and climbing over slabs of rock she was chiseling, often spending nights sleeping atop her sculptures. She was a favored sculptor by many Selgauntian [[human]] noble families, including [[Bowsuntide]] and [[Ornwindsea]] clans.
